name: Bin and Pyre
description:
Bin and Pyre run a business renting out the bats and boss monster birds they raise to the world at large. They work in a big compound and employ several other people, bats, witches, and otherwise. This game is about the end of one work day the two share.

(Uses RPGMaker Controls. Shift to run, Z to Accept, X to Decline, etc, etc.)

Featuring-

* RPGMaker assets!

* One chase event! (Pyre runs at you, it's not supposed to be scary, there's no jumpscare.)

* 3 Optional battles with no stakes! (Win, Lose, or Run, there's difference dialogue for each option.

* Two Vampires! (Bin and Pyre are vampires.)

* One ending!
